item.title: About
item.description: I got a Bachelor’s degree from the University of Trento, and my Master’s degree from the University of Milan. Currently, I work as a Software Engineer at Amazon Berlin. During my studies, I gained a lot of interest in algorithms and data structures, as well as distributed systems, databases, and search engines. I explored those topics with my master’s thesis on graph compression, and with side projects on LSM tree and search engine implementations.
